name: Orion Puzzle Collection
description:
Orion Puzzle Collection is a collection of three puzzle games.

In Yopaz Icestar, you play as Yopaz through forty levels in three worlds, collecting stars. The vacuum of space forces you to slide indefinitely when you run in one direction. Only an ice wall will stop Yopaz in his tracks.

In Yopaz 3D, Yopaz now traverses a three dimensional world to collect all the diamonds and avoid the enemies. There is also a built in level editor which can save up to eight custom levels.

In Turtle Chomp, the goal is to create the longest fruit line and chain the combos.
